div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 70 Kirrha, near Delphi, Phocis, 1938 Burial: 350-325 B.C. (Oeconomides, Hackens) Contents: 42 AR. From excavations Philip II: 2 tetradr. Larissa, Thess.: 4 dr. Locri Opuntii: 1 triob.; 1 ob. Phocis: 2 triob. Delphi: 1 trihemiob. Boeotia: 19 triob. Sicyon: 12 triob. Disposition: Athens Lemerle, BCH 1938, p. 446
